snippet: Russia’s Foreign Ministry responded to the United States’ adoption of a list imposing sanctions on officials who have been linked to the 2009 death of a whistleblower.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s Foreign Ministry responded to the United States’ adoption of a list imposing sanctions on officials who have been linked to the 2009 death of a whistleblower.

headline.main: Russia Will Bar Some U.S. Citizens in Retaliation
headline.print_headline: Russia Has List of Citizens Of U.S. to Bar From Entry
headline.seo: Russia Will Bar Some U.S. Citizens in Retaliatory Move
